name: react-cosmos-boolean-input-plugin
description: Enhanced boolean input in React Cosmos control panel

scripts.copy-package: cp cosmos.plugin.json dist && yarn pack --filename package.tgz && tar zxvf package.tgz && rm -r -f ../../example/node_modules/react-cosmos-boolean-input-plugin && mv package ../../example/node_modules/react-cosmos-boolean-input-plugin
